subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: As the N.C.A.A. is discussing the possibility of expanding its tournament, the assembling of this year’s field was defined by the undistinguished nature of the teams on the bubble.
snippet: As the N.C.A.A. is discussing the possibility of expanding its tournament, the assembling of this year’s field was defined by the undistinguished nature of the teams on the bubble.
